segments.text: Those kids are stealing cookies right under her nose!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s climbing on that stool like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl’s egging him on, hand out for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mother’s too busy with dishes to even glance back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear the water running over?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That sink is a mess, flooding the whole counter area.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle’s spreading, and no one’s doing a thing about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is so irresponsible; the stool could break.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies all over if he falls with that jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s polishing that plate like nothing’s wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks perfect, but inside it’s a disaster waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe they’re breaking the rules like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to stop this nonsense right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me so mad seeing potential harm ignored.
segments.speaker: PAR
